about_the_game:
Branded as traitors for revealing a genocidal plot to eliminate a peaceful species for their resources, your pilots Darius, Lana, Abeni, and Pablo must struggle to survive nearly endless waves of attacking ships from The Empire.

Take out what enemies you can as you upgrade your ship's weaponry and defensive capabilities in the hope of surviving long enough to make your escape.

Choose among different pilots and ships with varying abilities and weaponry in this sci-fi themed survivorslike. Evade a variety of enemy ships with different configurations and attack types, including heavily-armed battleships. With enough skill, you can save our heroes from certain doom.
